title: Get Shop Performance
content:
# Path: /analytics/202405/shop/performance
# Method: [GET]
# Function Description
Returns performance metrics at shop/seller level.

---


# Common Parameters
For common parameters, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Parameters](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top)
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Location <!-- width:75px --> | Type <!-- width:75px --> | Require <!-- width:60px --> | Sample <!-- width:254px --> | Properties description <!-- width:254px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| shop_cipher | query | string | Y | GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3 | Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. |
| Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9) |  |  |  |  |  |
| content-type | header | string | Y | application/json | Allowed type: application/json |
# Request Query Parameters
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Type <!-- width:90px --> | Require <!-- width:90px --> | Sample <!-- width:254px --> | Properties description <!-- width:254px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| app_key | string | Y | 38abcd | Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app. |
| sign | string | Y | 5361235029d141222525e303d742f9e38aea052d10896d3197ab9d6233730b8c | Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders. |
| timestamp | int | Y | 1623812664 | Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time. |
| start_date_ge | string | Y | 2024-04-01 | Start date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone. |
| In the parameter name, "ge" refers to "greater than or equal to" (inclusive) |  |  |  |  |
| end_date_lt | string | Y | 2024-04-08 | End date (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone. |
| In the parameter name, "lt" refers to "less than" (exclusive) |  |  |  |  |
| with_comparison | bool | N | true | Whether previous period data is returned for comparison. |
| Available values: true, false |  |  |  |  |
| Default value: false |  |  |  |  |
| The previous period has the same length and granularity as the current period with end time being the same as the start time of the current period. |  |  |  |  |
| Example: |  |  |  |  |
| If start_time_ge = 2024-04-01 and end_time_lt = 2024-04-08, the previous period data will be from 2024-03-25 to 2024-04-01. |  |  |  |  |
| granularity | string | N | ALL | Granularity of the data. |
| Available values: ALL, 1D |  |  |  |  |
| Default value: ALL |  |  |  |  |

* ALL: aggregate
* 1D: daily |
   currency |string |N |LOCAL |Currency.
   Available values: USD, LOCAL
   Default value: LOCAL
* USD: US dollars
* LOCAL: local currency where the shop is located |
   shop_cipher |string |Y |GCP_XF90igAAAABh00qsWgtvOiGFNqyubMt3 |Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9) |

# Request Sample
**Query**
```Plain Text
https://open-api.tiktokglobalshop.com/analytics/202405/shop/performance?app_key=123abc&sign=5361235029d141222525e303d742f9e38aea052d10896d3197ab9d6233730b8c&timestamp=1625484268&shop_cipher=ROW_RHkDDABBAAB8tKAVoAqsMTjsQZFLyNfY&start_date_ge=2024-04-01&end_date_lt=2024-04-08&with_comparison=true&granularity=ALL&currency=LOCAL
```

# Response Parameters
| Properties <!-- width:110px --> | Type <!-- width:90px --> | Sample <!-- width:289px --> | Properties description <!-- width:289px --> |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| code | int | 0 | The success or failure status code returned in API response. |
| message | string | Success | The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message. |
| request_id | string | 202203070749000101890810281E8C70B7 | Request log |
| data | object |  | Specific return information |
| ^performance | object |  | Overall performance data for the shop. |
| ^^intervals | []object |  | Interval data for the requested time range. The time range of each interval is determined by the granularity. |
| ^^^start_date | string | 2024-04-01 | Start date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, inclusive. |
| ^^^end_date | string | 2024-04-08 | End date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, exclusive. |
| ^^^gmv | object |  | Overall Gross Merchandise Value (GMV) for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0.00 | GMV amount in the corresponding currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^gmv_breakdowns | []object |  | GMV breakdowns for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0 | GMV amount for the corresponding type and currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^sku_orders | int | 0 | Number of Stock Keeping Units (SKUs) in orders placed. |
| ^^^orders | int | 0 | Total (sum of all) orders for a shop. |
| ^^^avg_order_value | object |  | Average value of an order for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0.00 | Average order value amount in the corresponding currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^units_sold | int | 0 | Number of units sold for the shop. |
| ^^^buyers | int | 0 | Number of unique buyers for the shop. |
| ^^^buyer_breakdowns | []object |  | Buyer breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Number of unique buyers for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^product_impressions | int | 0 | Total product impressions for the shop. |
| ^^^product_impression_breakdowns | []object |  | Product impression breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Total product impressions for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^product_page_views | int | 0 | The total number of views for your product detail page when viewers clicked product links. |
| ^^^product_page_view_breakdowns | []object |  | The total number of views for your product detail page when viewers clicked product links for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | The total number of views for your product detail page when viewers clicked product links for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^avg_product_page_visitors | int | 0 | Average number of unique visitors per day for the shop. |
| ^^^avg_product_page_visitor_breakdowns | []object |  | Average daily product page visitor breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Average number of unique visitors per day for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^refunds | object |  | Total value of refunds for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0.00 | Refunds in the corresponding currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^cancellations_and_returns | int | 0 | Total number of items that were canceled or returned for the shop. |
| ^^comparison_intervals | []object |  | Same structure as "intervals" |
| It contains data for the previous time range with the same range length and granularity of the current time range |  |  |  |
| Example, if current time range (represented in start_time_ge and end_time_lt) is from 2024-04-01 to 2024-04-08) with granularity "ALL", the previous_intervals will contain data from 2024-03-25 to 2024-04-01 with granularity "ALL". |  |  |  |
| ^^^start_date | string | 2024-04-01 | Start date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, inclusive. |
| ^^^end_date | string | 2024-04-08 | End date of the interval (ISO 8601 YYYY-MM-DD format) in shop registered timezone, exclusive. |
| ^^^gmv | object |  | Overall GMV for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0 | GMV amount for the corresponding type and currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^gmv_breakdowns | []object |  | GMV breakdowns for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0 | GMV amount for the corresponding type and currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^sku_orders | int | 0 | Number of SKUs in orders placed for the shop. |
| ^^^orders | int | 0 | Total (sum of all) orders for the shop. |
| ^^^avg_order_value | object |  | Average value of an order for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0 | Average order value amount in the corresponding currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^units_sold | int | 0 | Number of units sold for the shop. |
| ^^^buyers | int | 0 | Number of unique buyers for the shop. |
| ^^^buyer_breakdowns | []object |  | Buyer breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Number of unique buyers for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^product_impressions | int | 0 | Total product impressions for the shop. |
| ^^^product_impression_breakdowns | []object |  | Product impression breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Total product impressions for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^product_page_views | int | 0 | Total product detail page views for the shop. |
| ^^^product_page_view_breakdowns | []object |  | Product page view breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Total product detail page views for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^avg_product_page_visitors | int | 0 | Average number of unique visitors per day for the shop. |
| ^^^avg_product_page_visitor_breakdowns | []object |  | Average daily product page visitor breakdowns. |
| ^^^^amount | int | 0 | Average number of unique visitors per day for the corresponding type. |
| ^^^^type | string | LIVE | Breakdown type. |
| Possible values: LIVE, VIDEO, PRODUCT_CARD |  |  |  |
| ^^^refunds | object |  | Total value of refunds for the shop. |
| ^^^^amount | string | 0 | Refunds in the corresponding currency. |
| ^^^^currency | string | USD | GMV currency code (ISO 4217 standard). If LOCAL currency is requested, the value will be the local currency code of where the shop is registered (e.g. GBP). |
| ^^^cancellations_and_returns | int | 0 | Total number of items that were canceled or returned for the shop. |
| ^latest_available_date | string | 2024-04-07 | Latest date in local timezone where data is ready (ISO 8601 format). |
# Response Sample
```json
{"code":0,"data":{"performance":{"intervals":[{"start_date":"2024-04-01","end_date":"2024-04-08","gmv":{"amount":"0.00","currency":"USD"},"gmv_breakdowns":[{"amount":"0","currency":"USD","type":"LIVE"}],"sku_orders":0,"orders":0,"avg_order_value":{"amount":"0.00","currency":"USD"},"units_sold":0,"buyers":0,"buyer_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"product_impressions":0,"product_impression_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"product_page_views":0,"product_page_view_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"avg_product_page_visitors":0,"avg_product_page_visitor_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"refunds":{"amount":"0.00","currency":"USD"},"cancellations_and_returns":0}],"comparison_intervals":[{"start_date":"2024-04-01","end_date":"2024-04-08","gmv":{"amount":"0","currency":"USD"},"gmv_breakdowns":[{"amount":"0","currency":"USD","type":"LIVE"}],"sku_orders":0,"orders":0,"avg_order_value":{"amount":"0","currency":"USD"},"units_sold":0,"buyers":0,"buyer_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"product_impressions":0,"product_impression_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"product_page_views":0,"product_page_view_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"avg_product_page_visitors":0,"avg_product_page_visitor_breakdowns":[{"amount":0,"type":"LIVE"}],"refunds":{"amount":"0","currency":"USD"},"cancellations_and_returns":0}]},"latest_available_date":"2024-04-07"},"message":"Success","request_id":"202203070749000101890810281E8C70B7"}
```

# Error Code
For common error codes, refer to [How to call TikTok Shop APIs - Common Error Code](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/64f199679495ef0281851ee5#Back%20To%20Top)
| Code <!-- width:250px --> | Message <!-- width:553px --> |
| --- | --- |
| 28001022 | invalid request params; detail: start time or end time is invalid. |
